synopsis.text: Mai runs a supernatural troubleshooting agency and helps desperate clients with strange dilemmas when no one else can. Though highly skilled, she has a tendency to somehow end up naked during her unconventional investigations. On her latest case, Mai is hired by a worried family to find the mysterious Dr. Shinobi, their only hope for saving their sick daughter. Mai frequently crosses paths with the handsome doctor while handling peculiar assignments from celebrities, innkeepers and healers. No matter the predicament involving spirits, modesty issues, or reflexology mishaps, the resourceful and alluring Mai gets entangled in revealing situations but manages to save the day using her wits and appeal.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
